supply.supply_status: Good - Metropolitan division permanently stationed in Libya since pre-war period. Well-supplied at Italy's entry into WWII (10 June 1940). Fuel reserves 12 days for limited motor transport, ammunition stocks 22 days for static defense, water adequate at 4L/man/day for garrison operations, food reserves 25 days. Supply base: Benghazi via coastal logistics. Foot-mobile division with animal transport reduces fuel requirements.
